meanings: (장애물·구멍 등에) catch, be caught, be[get] stuck (in), (기계 등에 끼이다) be[get] jammed, (발이) trip, stumble
(그물·덫 등에) (그물 등에) be[get] caught[entangled], (덫에) be trapped[entrapped]
fall[tumble, trip] over a jagged stone

vlive.korean: 형 감기 걸려 - 와 형 이거 뭐야? You'll catch a cold. - MJ, what is this? 듣기 View video ASTRO : 초콜릿스트로🍫
vlive.english: You'll catch a cold. - MJ, what is this?

vlive.korean: 솔직히 여기에 신발만 신고 이것만 없으면 - 근데 신어야 돼 감기 걸려~ Honestly, if he wears shoes and this wasn't here.. - Wear shoes! You'll catch a cold! 듣기 View video ASTRO : 초콜릿스트로🍫
vlive.english: Honestly, if he wears shoes and this wasn't here.. - Wear shoes! You'll catch a cold!

vlive.korean: 얼마나 걸려? How long did it take? 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 혀니비니🐖🐇🦡
'화보 찍는데 얼마나 걸려요?' "How long does it take to do a pictorial shoot?" 듣기 View video NU'EST : [NU’EST REN] 안뇽🦋
vlive.english: "How long does it take to do a pictorial shoot?"

vlive.korean: 꽤 걸려 의자 들고 와 - 의자? It's going to take a while. Bring a chair. - A chair? 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 막내의 사생활 23 (생일 기념❤)🦊
vlive.english: It's going to take a while. Bring a chair. - A chair?

examples.korean: The doors were always locked and chained. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 문들은 항상 잠긴 채 사슬이 걸려 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The doors were always locked and chained. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Whole villages were stricken with the disease. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 모든 마을들이 그 질병에 걸려 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Whole villages were stricken with the disease. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I snagged my sweater on the wire fence. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 나는 철사 울타리에 스웨터가 걸렸다[걸려 뜯어졌다]. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I snagged my sweater on the wire fence. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The bird had become entangled in the wire netting. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 새는 철망에 걸려 꼼짝을 못하고 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The bird had become entangled in the wire netting. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: They had been turned to stone by an enchantment. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그들은 마법에 걸려 돌이 되어 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: They had been turned to stone by an enchantment. Add to Wordbook
